# SPAFAC

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SPAFAC is to propose sparse component-based methods, such as sparse principal component analysis, sparse correspondence analysis etc.

## Installation

You can install the development version of SPAFAC from
[GitHub](https://github.com/juchiyu/SPAFAC) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("juchiyu/SPAFAC")
```

## Examples and vignettes

Examples and vignettes are available on the companion website.
